key_risks: Labor controversies including harsh working conditions and rescinded job offers
Regulatory scrutiny and legal challenges, including a $102 million fine for anti-competitive practices
Profitability concerns due to high operational costs
controversies: Allegations of excessive overtime and inadequate safety measures in warehouses
Unlawful managerial activities and worker protests
Algorithm manipulation to prioritize private-label products
Unexpected tax investigation by South Korean authorities
environmental_issues: Plans to reduce carbon footprint through optimized delivery routes and eco-friendly packaging
social_issues: Harsh labor conditions and worker protests
Rescinded job offers damaging employer reputation
governance_issues: Tax investigation by South Korean authorities
